text: Charles Johnson (January 17, 1952 - August 13, 2021) was an American football player. He played nine seasons in the National Football League. He played in Super Bowl XV for the Philadelphia Eagles and was selected to three Pro Bowls. He also played for the Minnesota Vikings. His career lasted from 1979 until 1981. Johnson was born in West Columbia, Texas. Johnson died on August 13, 2021 in St. Louis, Missouri at the age of 69.Mr. Charles Johnson ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American football defensive tackles Category:Philadelphia Eagles players Category:Minnesota Vikings players Category:Sportspeople from Texas
title: Charlie Johnson (defensive tackle)
